column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Wow. Bavette's is one of the best places I have ever been to. I'm just going to get to the point
column2: the best things to try. The baked goat cheese is a great way to start your meal
column3: the east coast oysters are perfect
column4: the truffle Mac and cheese blends is so creamy and delicious
column5: the 20 oz Bone in Ribeye (Bottom on steak section) is one of the best steaks I've ever had
column6: and the griddled burger with bacon is wonderful. The only thing is that the bacon is really thick so it may be too overwhelming.
